dmca.title: APPA Requests Removal of Material from Its Players Manual (#19)
dmca.body:
FEE 18 2004 15:54 FR THOMPSON COBURN LLP 1	TO [Private] P.01/13

THOMPSONCOBURN	Thompson Coburn LLP
	Attorneys at Law
	[Private]
	St. Louis, Missouri 63101-1693
	xxx-xxx-xxxx
	FAX xxx-xxx-xxxx
	wwww.thompsoncoburn.com

Facsimile

FOR IMMEDIATE DELIVERY
To	[Private]	Phone	Fax
Attention: customer Support, DMCA	Googic, Inc. 	xxx-xxx-xxxx
Complaints

From:	[Private], Esq.
Thompson Coburn LLP
Attorneys at Law
[Private]
St. Louis, Missouri 63101
xxx-xxx-xxxx
Fax xxx-xxx-xxxx
www.thompsoncoburn.com

February 18, 2004	

[Private]
xxx-xxx-xxxx 
FAX xxx-xxx-xxxx 
EMAIL [Private]@thompsoncoburn.com 

VIA FACSIMALE (xxx-xxx-xxxx)

Google, Inc.
Attn: Customer Support, DMCA Complaints 
[Private]
Mountain View, CA 94043

Re:	Notice of Alleged Infringement under DMCA 
	Our Ref.: [Private]

Dear Sir or Madam:

1. Identify in sufficient detail the copyrighted work that you believe has been infringed.

	See attached pages from our client's Players Manual.

2. Identify the material that you claim is infringing the copyrighted work listed in item #1 above.

The material that out client, American Pool Players Association, Inc., is claiming infringes the copyrighted work listed in item # I can be found at bjs15.19466$hp4.536714@newsread1.prod.itd.earthlink.net, starting with "Subject: Re APA Handicapping-repost", a copy of which is attached.

3. Provide information reasonably sufficient to permit Google to contact you (email address is preferred).

[Private]
Thompson Coburn LLP
[Private]
St. Louis, MO 63101
xxx-xxx-xxxx
xxx-xxx-xxxx fax
[Private]@thompsoncoburn.com

4. Provide information, if possible, sufficient to permit Google to notify the owner/administrator of the web page that allegedly contains infringing material (email address is preferred).

The individual that posted the infringing material can be found at [Private]@earthlink.net.

I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing newsgroup is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

Sincerely,

Thompson Coburn LLP

By
	[Private]

CGC/jmo 

Enclosures 
cc: [Private]
